methods.Synopsis: Authenticates a person. This is used for consumer access to stores, administration of stores and management of assets

parameters.Name: auth_user
parameters.Description: The person's login (the email address used with the account)

parameters.Name: auth_password
parameters.Description: The password for the account

parameters.Name: auth_store
parameters.Description: The store one wishes to access. For management and administration purposes, use the store "null"

methods.Synopsis: Creates a new account

parameters.Name: email
parameters.Description: The email to use for this account. Must be unique, as only one account per email is permitted

parameters.Name: password
parameters.Description: The password to be used with this account

parameters.Name: firstname
parameters.Description: The person's first name

parameters.Name: middlenames
parameters.Description: The person's middle names

parameters.Name: lastname
parameters.Description: The person's last name

methods.Synopsis: Confirms a new (or reactivated) account

parameters.Name: code
parameters.Description: The code received in the confirmation email

parameters.Name: id
parameters.Description: Numeric ID of the account to activate

parameters.Name: email
parameters.Description: The email associated with the account

methods.Synopsis: Requests a password reset. This will result in an email being sent to the user with a link to a page to complete the reset process

parameters.Name: email
parameters.Description: The email associated with the account to perform the password reset on

methods.Synopsis: Resets the password for an account, requires a code generated by a call to the password reset request method; the GET version of this method generates an HTML form that will submit to the POST version

parameters.Name: email
parameters.Description: The email associated with the account to perform the password reset on

parameters.Name: code
parameters.Description: The code generated by the password reset request

parameters.Name: id
parameters.Description: The numeric id of the account

parameters.Name: password1
parameters.Description: The new password for the account

methods.Synopsis: Changes the password for the account currently authenticated

parameters.Name: newPassword
parameters.Description: The new password; must be at least eight characters in length

methods.Synopsis: Allows changing information for the account currently authenticated (except passwords; see the 'Change password' method)

parameters.Name: email
parameters.Description: The email address to use with this account; it must not be associated with any other account since it is used as the username for authentication

parameters.Name: firstName
parameters.Description: First name of the person this account belongs to

parameters.Name: middelNames
parameters.Description: Middle names of the person this account belongs to

parameters.Name: lastName
parameters.Description: Last name of the person this account belongs to

parameters.Name: card[number]
parameters.Description: Credit card number to use; must be present with all other card information

parameters.Name: card[exp_month]
parameters.Description: Credit card expiry month; must be present with all other card information

parameters.Name: card[exp_year]
parameters.Description: Credit card expiry year; must be present with all other card information

parameters.Name: active
parameters.Description: Whether or not the account should be activated (otherwise log ins for this account will be denied)

methods.Synopsis: Fetches the current payment method (limited to last digits of card)
Updates the current payment method

parameters.Description: Credit card expiry month; must be present with all other card information

parameters.Description: Credit card expiry year; must be present with all other card information

methods.Synopsis: Retrieves all public information related to an asset including the name, description, license, version, partner (owner/publisher), tags and related images and whether or not the currentl authenticated account can download it

parameters.Name: assetId
parameters.Description: The id of the asset, which must exist in the store you are authenticated against

methods.Synopsis: Attempts to download an asset; if the asset is not available or not yet purchased an error with that informaton is returned. It is up to the client to decide how to install or otherwise put to use the downloaded asset

parameters.Name: assetId
parameters.Description: The id of the asset to download, which must exist in the store you are authenticated against

methods.Synopsis: Attempts to purchase an asset; if the asset is not available in the store currently authenticated against or the account does not have enough ponts, an error with that informaton is returned

parameters.Name: assetId
parameters.Description: The id of the asset to download, which must exist in the store you are authenticated against

methods.Synopsis: Creates a new asset owned by you. A file named "info" may be uploaded that contains all the metadata for the asset in lieue of the info body, a file named "asset" which is the actual asset. A file can be uploaded with the request

parameters.Name: info
parameters.Description: A json document that contains the name, license, partner ID, base price, description and version of the new asset. It may also include a set of tags.

parameters.Name: asset
parameters.Description: The asset itself

methods.Synopsis: Deletes an asset

parameters.Name: assetId
parameters.Description: Deletes an asset owned by you

methods.Synopsis: Updates an asset owned by you. Otherwise identical to create.

parameters.Name: assetId
parameters.Description: The id of the asset to delete. Must be owned by a partner you are affiliated with

parameters.Name: info
parameters.Description: A json document that contains the name, license, partner ID, base price, description and version of the new asset. It may also include a set of tags.
